status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"946tr","text":"Place frozen tissue in a well of a 6 well plate containing 1 mL of cold NST disassociation buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"psa7","text":"Chop tissue using a scalpel until mostly homogenized","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dca6i","text":"Filter the homogenized solution through a 40 uM falcon cell strainer into a 50 mL falcon tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d6j44","text":"Use an additional 1 mL of NST buffer to rinse the well and filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2pic8","text":"Centrifuge nuclei at 300 g for 10 minutes and aspirate supernatant completely","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"baqnj","text":"Resuspend pellet and bring the volume up to 5 mL using ST buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2n4c7","text":"Transfer solution to 15 mL conical tube and centrifuge for 10 minutes at 300 g at 4oC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"77rdn","text":"10.  Resuspend pellets on ice in 1 ml of the ST buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hetr","text":"13.  Resuspend nuclei pellet in resuspension buffer to get a concentration of 1,000 nuclei per uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqcd8","text":"Centrifuge nuclei at 300 g for 10 minutes and aspirate supernatant completely","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6fo3g","text":"    Start with .5 mL per 0.2 grams of endometrial tumor tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3df2l","text":"Look at nuclear membranes at 40x-60x to ensure high nuclear membrane quality with minimal blebbing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Nuclear extraction from endometrial tumors for single nuclei sequencing
title_html: Nuclear extraction from endometrial tumors for single nuclei sequencing
